# CMSampleBuffer.SizePerSample

**Enumeration**

Specifies size of each sample in a sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SizePerSample
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **CMSampleBuffer.SizePerSample.distinct(_:)**: Each sample has a distinct size.
- **CMSampleBuffer.SizePerSample.uniform(_:)**: Each sample has the same size.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
